channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Popup Anything – A Marketing Popup
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Popup Anything – A Marketing Popup

item.title: CVE-2021-24883|2024-08-03T19:49:12.675Z -- unknown -- popup%20anything%20%E2%80%93%20a%20marketing%20popup
item.description: The Popup Anything WordPress plugin before 2.0.4 does not escape the Link Text and Button Text fields of Popup, which could allow users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks
